ChainMeasureUnitType.description: Codebook for type of chain facility

ChainFacilityType.description: Codebook for type of chain facility

code.description: Two letter country code of country (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code).
Two letter country code of country (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code).

ChainFileInfo.description: Represents a document in the system

storageKey.description: Storage key used for access to the actual file.

ChainOrganization.description: Organization is a representative object of a company in af-coffee-app.

userCreatedId.description: Id of user that created the document.

userChangedId.description: Id of user that changed the document.

entityType.description: Type of entity (table in af-coffee app)

mediaLinks.description: social media URL links (Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, ...)

status.description: Product label status

numberOfFarmers.description: number of farmers at this location

text.description: origin - text and quantity input - Briefly describe where the product or its ingredients are produced

description.description: description of this standard and certification

codesOfConduct.description: codes of conduct - Briefly describe your company codes of conduct that your employees

production.description: production description - Briefly describe your production process

storage.description: storage - Briefly describe your storage procedures

laborPolicies.description: labor policies - Briefly describe labor policies you have in place in your company

relationship.description: storage - Briefly describe your storage procedures

co2Footprint.description: CO2 footprint - If you have calculated your company CO2 footprint, please add this information

packaging.description: sustainable packaging - Describe the environmental sustainability of your packaging, max 1000 chars

ChainProduct.description:
Represents general product definition of a product. Example: Coffee Angelique (without specific packaging, quantity, ...)
It DOES NOT represent an example of a product unit one can buy (e.g. a type of product unit of 50g coffee bag of brand Angelique)
It DOES NOT represent any particular product instance/shippment/bag ... (e.g. A particular 50g bag of brand Anguelique in some facility
such that one can actually get it.)
It only represents product description with core properties.
Sellable (orderable) types of a product of this kind are described by the class ChainSemiProduct.
Instances of semi products are described by ChainStockOrder.

userCreatedId.description: Id of user that created the document.

userChangedId.description: Id of user that changed the document.

organizationRoles.description: List of roles of companies on the product value chain

organizationId.description: Chain organization id matching companyId, set automatically from companyId on read or write.

organization.description: Chain organization matching companyId, set automatically.

howToUse.description: how to Use / Recipes - Describe the best way to use the product (e.g. recipes, how to apply the product...)

ingredients.description: ingredients - list the ingredients in the product and describe their properties

keyMarketsShare.description: Key Markets, market name - share number map

nutritionalValue.description: nutritional Value - list the nutritional value of the product

ChainSemiProduct.description:
Represents a product definition of a product of some organization (ChainOrganization).
It DOES NOT represent any praticular product instance/shippment/bag ...
It only represents product description with core properties.
Product instances are denoted by class ChainProductItem.

userCreatedId.description: Id of user that created the document.

userChangedId.description: Id of user that changed the document.

productId.description: id reference of the relevant ChainProduct

measurementUnitType.description: Type of a measurement unit for quantity of the product (used for stock orders of this product)

isSKU.description: Whether the product is considered as Stock keeping unit (at producer)

isSKUEndCustomer.description: Whether the product is considered as Stock keeping unit (for end customer)

product.description: Product object. Set automatically on read. Ignored on write (not stored, obtained through productId)

ChainFacility.description:
Each organization (ChainOrganization) may have several facilities. Facility is considered as a storage space for
product units (ChainProductUnit). Transactions (ChainTransaction) run between facilities and are recorded by
ChainTransaciton objects.

userCreatedId.description: Id of user that created the document.

userChangedId.description: Id of user that changed the document.

facilityType.description: Role of the facility in the value chain

isPublic.description: Whether anybody can list stock orders from this facility (facility intended for sale).

organization.description: Organization object. Set automatically on read. Ignored on write (not stored, obtained through organizationId)

userCreatedId.description: Id of user that created the document.

userChangedId.description: Id of user that changed the document.

description.description: description of this standard and certification

requiredOnQuote.description: Field is required if related to quote order.

stringValue.description: String value of the field, if the type is 'text', 'date' or 'timestamp'

numericValue.description: Numeric value if the type is 'number'

fileMultiplicity.description: Number of files if the type is 'file'. For unlimited number use 'any'.

ChainDocumentRequirement.description: Description of the document requirements for an order.

documentIdentifier.description: Document identifier (type). Used to identify particular type of document and for matching.

fields.description: List of field definition. Order is important.

ScoreTargets.description: Defines score targets for an order. Typically an integer counting amount of documents.

semiProductId.description: Semi product for which document requirement list is relevant.

hasSmartPhone.description: Whether a contact has a smart phone.

FarmInfo.description: Describes some data about a farm of a customer.

ownsFarm.description: Whether a user customer owns a farm.

organicFarm.description: True if it is an organic farm

userCreatedId.description: Id of user that created the document.

userChangedId.description: Id of user that changed the document.

productId.description: Product Id as in af-coffee database

chainProductId.description: Product id in chain database. If productId is given and organization with such id is in the database, then organizationId is ignored and set automatically.;

companyId.description: Company Id as in af-coffee database

organizationId.description: Organization id. If companyId is given and organization with such id is in the database, then organizationId is ignored and set automatically.;

location.description: Location of the user as a customer. Typicaly a production location or location of a farm.

cooperativeIdsAndRoles.description: List of references to cooperatives (producers) and their roles

ChainStockOrder.description:
Represents a product instance (package, bag, container, drying bed, etc.) of a product defined by ChainProduct.
Product unit is located on one facility only. It is measured by some quantity units (unitType) and
by the number totalQuantity. Ti has official production date (productionDate) and expiry date (expiryDate)
A product unit may be represented by a label in FE.

Product unit can be created from nothing (e.g. picking the coffee).
In general product unit is created by some transactions (ChainTransaction). Product unit does not
change its facility. Instead a product unit is transformed by a list of transactions (Chain)
to different product unit either in the same facility or in some other facility.

userCreatedId.description: Id of user that created the document.

userChangedId.description: Id of user that changed the document.

representativeOfProducerUserCustomerId.description: Representative of producer user customer. E.g. collector. Relevant only for order type: PURCHASE_ORDER

producerUserCustomerId.description: Id of the person who has produced the entry. Relevant only for order type: PURCHASE_ORDER

productionLocation.description: Location of the production. Relevant only for order type: PURCHASE_ORDER

consumerCompanyCustomerId.description: Consumer company customer. Relevant for order type: SALES_ORDER

facilityId.description: Facility Id where product unit is located

measurementUnitType.description: Quantity unit tipe. Calculated automatically from semiProduct at insertion.

orderId.description: Order which triggered creation of the product unit

globalOrderId.description: Global order id. Global order is initial order that triggers other orders in value chain.

pricePerUnit.description:
Price per unit (purchase price). Relevant for type PURCHASE_ORDER. Irrelevant for PROCESSING_ORDER.
Should be calculated from input transactions for SALES_ORDER and GENERAL_ORDER

currency.description:
Purchase currency. Currency code according to ISO 4217 for pricePerUnit.
Relevant for all orders. In case of order type SALES_ORDER it denotes the price
of sale to the final customer.

salesCurrency.description: Sales currency. Currency code according to ISO 4217 for pricePerUnit

isPurchaseOrder.description: Is it a purchase order? Depricated, should use orderType: PURCHASE_ORDER

orderType.description:
Order type.
- PURCHASE_ORDER - created during purchase of coffee from farmers. No input transactions, allows output transactions.
- PROCESSING_ORDER - created as a result of a processing transaction. No input transactions, allows output transactions.
- SALES_ORDER - created on behalf of final customer. Filled by input transactions. No output transactions allowed.
- GENERAL - general (transport) order in the middle of the value chain. Allows input and output transactions.
- TRANSFER ORDER - generated through transfer processing actions

semiProduct.description: Semi-product object. Set automatically on read. Ignored on write (not stored, obtained through semiProductId)

facility.description: Facility object. Set automatically on read. Ignored on write (not stored, obtained through facilityId)

representativeOfProducerUserCustomer.description: Representative of producer user customer. Not saved. Used for setting id.

producerUserCustomer.description: User customer. Not saved. Used for setting id.

inputTransactions.description: Input transactions for stock order. Read only.

outputTransactions.description: Output transactions for stock order. Read only.

clientId.description: Client's name (ID) TODO: add foreign key, when ApiProductCompany is defined

processingActionId.description: Processing action id. The order cannot be deleted directly through API, if this is not null.

consumerCompanyCustomer.description: Consumer company customer. Relevant for order type: SALES_ORDER

sacNumber.description: Sac number. Relevant when outputs repacked

triggerOrderIds.description: Id of the quote order that triggered the this order

isOpenOrder.description: Calculated property, depending on whether total quantity differs from fullfiled quantity.

quoteFacilityId.description: Quote facility - the facility to which a quote is made

quoteOrganizationId.description: Quote organization id. Set automatically from quoteFacilityId while saving.

productOrder.description: Product order matching orderId. Read only.

triggerOrders.description: Product order matching triggerOrderId. Read only.

triggeredOrders.description: List of orders that have been trigerred by this order. Read only

ChainTransaction.description:
Represents a chain value transaction between product units. Essentialy a transaction
denotes taking some quantity of a source product unit (sourceProductUnitid) and transferring it to some
target product unit (targetProductUnitId), where the product units are necessary different.
Product units can be in the same facility (e.g. processing) or in different ones (e.g. transporations).
Exact business operation is denoted by actionOrShippment

userCreatedId.description: Id of user that created the document.

userChangedId.description: Id of user that changed the document.

semiProductId.description: Semi product id. Auto set at inserting

sourceFacilityId.description: Source facility. Set automatically from the semi product.

targetFacilityId.description: Target facility. Set automatically from the semi product.

isProcessing.description: True if the transaction is a processing transactions

actionType.description: Definition of transaction action viewed as a business action.

status.description: Transaction status.

inputMeasureUnitType.description: Input measure unit type. Set automatically from semi product.

outputMeasureUnitType.description: Output measure unit type. Set automatically from semi product.

currency.description: Currency code according to ISO 4217 for pricePerUnit

userCreatedId.description: Id of user that created the document.

userChangedId.description: Id of user that changed the document.

id.description: capitalized underscored string that defines the document requirement

type.description: Type of evidence type. DOCUMENT is prescribed (date, type, document). FIELD is any other. Some others can be added.

fairness.description: Whether the evidence is of fairness type

provenance.description: Whether the evidence is of provenance type

quality.description: Whether the evidence is of quality type

required.description: Whether the evidence is required (not used for settings, just in transformations)

requiredOnQuote.description: Whether the evidence is required on quote (not used for settings, just in transformations)

requiredOneOfGroupIdForQuote.description: Defines a group in which at least one document has to be provided (is required)

userCreatedId.description: Id of user that created the document.

userChangedId.description: Id of user that changed the document.

productId.description: id reference of the relevant ChainProduct

organizationId.description: id reference of the relevant ChainOrganization

requiredDocTypeIds.description: List of required document types for processing ids

requiredDocTypeIdsWithRequired.description: List of required document types for processing ids

requiredDocTypes.description: List of required document types for processing ids

repackedOutputs.description: If transaction output has multiple outputSemiProducts

maxOutputWeight.description: Max weight of one of the multiple outputSemiProducts (required if repackedOutputs)

type.description:
Type of processing transaction.
PROCESSING: many-to-many semi products, consumed and produced quantities not connected
SHIPMENT: same semiproduct. Acts as an order of the same quantity from target facility

prefix.description: Prefix. Used to build internal lot number names.

publicTimelineLabel.description: Public timeline name. If not null, the processing order with this action is shown on public timeline.

ChainProcessingOrder.description: Processing order executed according to processing transaction.

userCreatedId.description: Id of user that created the document.

userChangedId.description: Id of user that changed the document.

facilityId.description: Facility id. Not clear, how to put this into facility.

initiatorUserId.description: Processing order initiator (user), userId from af-coffee-ap

targetStockOrderIds.description: Target stock order Ids. Calculated when saving. Should not be counted as a reference when programing chaincode since the primary reference is from targert order back.

desiredQuantity.description: Desired quantity when it acts like an order (processing action type is TRANSFER.

desiredQuantityUnit.description: Measure unit of the desired quantity.

currency.description: currency code according to ISO 4217 for price

userCreatedId.description: Id of user that created the document.

userChangedId.description: Id of user that changed the document.

cccid.description:
Custemor id from af-coffee-ap database

companyId.description: Company Id as in af-coffee database

chainProductId.description: Product id in chain database. Set automatically from productId.
